{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = DragonBoard 410C front.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = DragonBoard 410c |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.96boards.org/product/dragonboard410c/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = 96boards_DragonBoard_410C |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = 96Boards |model = DragonBoard 410C |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = REV C |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFQA-DB410C |icid = 20763-DB410C |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;APQ8016E; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC 4.51 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SanDisk;SD90528K-8G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR3 |ram1type1 = PoP |ram1spd = 1066 |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 00:0A:F5
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Android Bootloader;;; |stockos = Linux;3.10.49;Android 5.1.1;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 1.4 |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 8-18 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 4.8 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 1.4, Bluetooth 4.1, GPS receiver, SPI, I2C, I2S, GPIO, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, |addchip = GNSS RF Receiver;Qualcomm;WGR7640;;1;,,, 3-port USB Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2513B;;1;,,, Power Management IC (PMIC);Qualcomm;PM8916;;1;,,, MIPI/DSI Receiver w/ HDMI Transmitter;Analog Devices;ADV7533;;1;,,, MIPI D-PHY (1.5Gbps) 4-Data Lane Switch;ON Semi;FSA644;;1;,,, 500kHz, 4A, 18V Input Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8104;;2;,,, USB OTB Protection IC;TI;TPD4S214;;2;,,, Low-Capacitance 6-Channel ESD-Protection;TI;TPD6E001;;1;,,, 4-Channel ESD Solution for USB;TI;TPD4S012;;1;,,, 13-Channel ESD Protection for HDMI;TI;TPD13S523;;1;,,, 200mA Low-Dropout Linear Regulator;TI;TPS79333;;1;,,, Slew-Rate-Controlled Load Switch;ON Semi;FPF1203;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arrow Electronics |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, Ubuntu Core, Windows IoT Core,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2015 |estprice = 75 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Qualcomm;WCN3620; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Qualcomm]]'' APQ8016E Quad-core Cortex-A53 @1.2GHz *GPU: ''[[Qualcomm]]'' Adreno 306 @400Mhz *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3L @533MHz *Onboard Storage: 8 GiB eMMC, TF card (max. 128GB) / MMC card slot *Wifi: 802.11bgn *USB: 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB OTG *Power Source: DC Jack 8-18V
==Links of Interest== *[https://developer.qualcomm.com/hardware/dragonboard-410c Tools & Resources] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/06/21/dragonboard-410c-64-bit-arm-development-board-in-stock-for-75/ ''DragonBoard 410c 64-bit ARM Development Board'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/tiny-sbc-runs-android-and-linux-on-snapdragon-410/ ''Tiny SBC runs Android and Linux on Snapdragon 410'' on '''LinuxGizmos''' ]
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:DragonBoard 410C front.png| File:DragonBoard 410C back.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
